short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set reminders for tabs. Keep your workspace organized

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes our browser tabs get cluttered. We have too many tabs open. It makes it harder to concentrate, and to be productive.

Tab Ninja can remind you of any tab you need at any moment in the future.
